event.title: 2 day introduction to R course
event.description:
Active Analytics is hosting a 2-day public introduction to R course in Bristol City Centre. The course is a full introduction to the R programming language and the details are given in the website http://www.active-analytics.com/training/statistics/introduction-to-r/, all the delegates need is a laptop with R and RStudio (both free) installed and able to connect to WiFi.

R: http://www.r-project.org/

RStudio: http://www.rstudio.com/

The course is discounted and priced per person at £550.

See http://www.active-analytics.com for information on our company

There are a total of 6 places on this course.

For more information contact [masked]

Thank you
